text: Hey Community Friends, We’re thrilled to announce that the 2025 OnePlus Photography Awards are officially open for submissions! Whether you’re a professional photographer or just someone who loves capturing life’s unforgettable moments, this is your chance to shine. Grab your smartphone, unleash your creativity, and show the world what you’ve got! Details About the Competition Who Can Join? EVERYONE! Whether you’re a OnePlus user or not, you’re welcome to participate. OnePlus Group: Entries must be shot on a OnePlus smartphone (any model). Public Group: Any smartphone brand or model is accepted. Competition Categories We’ve got three exciting categories for you to explore. Which one speaks to your creative soul? Movement: Breathe Each Moment Capture eternity suspended in time. Share your visual stories of speed, adventure, and travel. From the fleeting emotion of daily life, the adrenaline rush within a single second, to the beauty that flows across every motion, use your lens to capture your world. Night and Low Light: Light Up Your World Unveil the breathtaking magic of the night world and the sparkling atmosphere of low-light environments. Showcase your mastery of light and shadow with vibrant cityscapes, skies painted with stars, glittering firework displays—and everything in between. Faces: Portray Each Moment Capture the compelling texture of human emotion. From the joy behind every smile to the stories etched in every wrinkle, share mesmerizing portraits of your family, friends, and pets. Each image is a sentence in your life story, evoking feelings that speak to the viewer, across cultures, and across time. Timeline Submission Deadline: June 30, 2025, 11:59 PM (UTC+8) Winner Announcement: August 19, 2025, World Photography Day Awards and Prizes Main Prize $10,000 cash prize! Exposure Opportunity – Winning works will be showcased on official OnePlus Channels and 500px Channels. OnePlus Image Partner – Winners will receive the prestigious titles “OnePlus Photography Expert” and “OnePlus Photography Ambassador”. OnePlus Flagship Phone – All winners will receive our latest OnePlus 13 device. Rules to Remember Entries must be shot after February 7, 2023. Only basic edits (brightness, contrast, etc.) are allowed—no AIGC or heavy editing. Each participant can submit up to 15 entries per category. Photos must include complete EXIF information. For more details, click here. Meet Our Judges Share Your Entries on Social Media Got a killer shot? Tag us and let the world see your masterpiece! Share your entries on Instagram with the hashtags #OnePlusPhotoAwards and #ShotonOnePlus. If your photo catches our eye and gets featured on the official OnePlus account, you’ll automatically be considered a finalist! At OnePlus, we believe the OnePlus Photography Awards isn’t just a competition—it’s a celebration of creativity, storytelling, and the art of photography. Whether you’re chasing the grand prize or just want to share your unique perspective, your photos could inspire millions. So, what are you waiting for? Grab your phone, start shooting, and let your creativity shine. We can’t wait to see the world through your lens! Submit Now
html:
Hey Community Friends,

We’re thrilled to announce that the 2025 OnePlus Photography Awards are officially open for submissions! Whether you’re a professional photographer or just someone who loves capturing life’s unforgettable moments, this is your chance to shine.

Grab your smartphone, unleash your creativity, and show the world what you’ve got!

Details About the Competition

Who Can Join?

EVERYONE! Whether you’re a OnePlus user or not, you’re welcome to participate.

  • OnePlus Group: Entries must be shot on a OnePlus smartphone (any model).
  • Public Group: Any smartphone brand or model is accepted.

Competition Categories

We’ve got three exciting categories for you to explore. Which one speaks to your creative soul?

Movement: Breathe Each Moment

Capture eternity suspended in time. Share your visual stories of speed, adventure, and travel. From the fleeting emotion of daily life, the adrenaline rush within a single second, to the beauty that flows across every motion, use your lens to capture your world.

Night and Low Light: Light Up Your World

Unveil the breathtaking magic of the night world and the sparkling atmosphere of low-light environments. Showcase your mastery of light and shadow with vibrant cityscapes, skies painted with stars, glittering firework displays—and everything in between.

Faces: Portray Each Moment

Capture the compelling texture of human emotion. From the joy behind every smile to the stories etched in every wrinkle, share mesmerizing portraits of your family, friends, and pets. Each image is a sentence in your life story, evoking feelings that speak to the viewer, across cultures, and across time.

Timeline

  • Submission Deadline: June 30, 2025, 11:59 PM (UTC+8)
  • Winner Announcement: August 19, 2025, World Photography Day

Awards and Prizes

Main Prize

  • $10,000 cash prize!
  • Exposure Opportunity – Winning works will be showcased on official OnePlus Channels and 500px Channels.
  • OnePlus Image Partner – Winners will receive the prestigious titles “OnePlus Photography Expert” and “OnePlus Photography Ambassador”.
  • OnePlus Flagship Phone – All winners will receive our latest OnePlus 13 device.

Rules to Remember

  • Entries must be shot after February 7, 2023.
  • Only basic edits (brightness, contrast, etc.) are allowed—no AIGC or heavy editing.
  • Each participant can submit up to 15 entries per category.
  • Photos must include complete EXIF information.

For more details, click here.

Meet Our Judges

Share Your Entries on Social Media

Got a killer shot? Tag us and let the world see your masterpiece! Share your entries on Instagram with the hashtags #OnePlusPhotoAwards and #ShotonOnePlus. If your photo catches our eye and gets featured on the official OnePlus account, you’ll automatically be considered a finalist!

At OnePlus, we believe the OnePlus Photography Awards isn’t just a competition—it’s a celebration of creativity, storytelling, and the art of photography. Whether you’re chasing the grand prize or just want to share your unique perspective, your photos could inspire millions.

So, what are you waiting for? Grab your phone, start shooting, and let your creativity shine. We can’t wait to see the world through your lens!

Submit Now
